A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a good addition to the Star Wars story. However\, it left several questions from the first move unanswered such as who Snoke really is\, as well as who Ray’s parents really are. Spoiler (the movie makes it seem to indicate that she is not related to any of the original characters at all. That her parents are nobodies weather this is true or just a way to confuse us and throw us off still remains unanswered.) There is a scene with Rey in it that makes absolutely no sense at all. Also what they have done to Luke’s Character is both interesting and sad. As he seems to have changed A great deal from the Luke Skywalker we all know and love. The other thing that I find sad is that they seem to take delight in killing off all the original characters. However\, the storyline is great and it is as action packed as to be expected from any Star Wars movie. Can’t want to see the next installment. However\, I am not looking forward to seeing who they kill off from the originals in the upcoming movie which I believe is to be released next year.
